description:
Samuel L Jackson, surprisingly, doesn't yell at Dave Bautista. :]

🎬 Samuel L. Jackson Wants Dave Bautista to Steal the Mona Lisa (2025) | 4K Scene from Afterburn
A heist class you can’t refuse. In this high-stakes clip from Afterburn, Samuel L. Jackson lays out the ultimate theft: stealing the Mona Lisa — and he’s betting on Dave Bautista to pull it off.

Scene Overview
Jackson’s character delivers a commanding pitch to Bautista — not just for a robbery, but for an art heist of the world’s most iconic painting. With tension in every word and pressure in every glance, this scene reveals the urgency and audacity behind Afterburn’s criminal core.


A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members! 
Ya'll really do keep the lights on for us over here.
- The audio claims for our promotional features are getting out of hand.

Enjoy advanced 4K Upscaling and HDR-10 mastering across future trailers. Stay tuned for more.
